mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.issue_note_sid, t.issue_note_code, t.vendor_sid, t.document_date, t.plant_sid, t.document_type, t.business_type, t.consignee, t.consignee_phone, t.consignee_addr, t.shipping_order_code, t.carrier, t.carrier_note_code, t.shipping_point, t.expected_issue_date, t.issue_status, t.operator, t.company_sid, t.material_category, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.vendor_code, t1.vendor_name, t1.short_name, t2.plant_code, t2.plant_name, t3.nick_name, t4.vendor_code as carrier_code, t4.vendor_name as carrier_name, t5.name as document_type_name, t6.name as business_type_name, t7.nick_name as creator_account_name, t8.nick_name as updater_account_name, t9.storehouse_operator, t10.approval_node, t10.approval_user_name, t10.create_date as submit_date, t10.approval_user_id, t11.nick_name as submit_user_name, t12.manufacture_order_sid, t12.manufacture_order_code from s_del_outsource_material_issue_note t LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t1 ON t1.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant t2 ON t2.plant_sid = t.plant_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t3.user_name = t.operator LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t4 ON t4.vendor_sid = t.carrier LEFT JOIN s_con_doc_type_outsource_mi t5 ON t5.code = t.document_type LEFT JOIN s_con_bu_type_outsource_mi t6 ON t6.code = t.business_type LEFT JOIN sys_user t7 ON t7.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t8 ON t8.user_name = t.updater_account left join s_inv_inventory_document t9 on t9.refer_document_sid=t.issue_note_sid LEFT JOIN s_sys_form_process t10 ON t10.form_id = t.issue_note_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t11 ON t11.user_id = t10.create_by_id LEFT JOIN s_del_outsource_material_issue_note_item t12 ON t12.issue_note_sid = t.issue_note_sid
mapper.insert:
insert into s_del_outsource_material_issue_note
client_id, issue_note_sid, issue_note_code, document_date, vendor_sid, document_type, plant_sid, business_type, consignee, consignee_phone, consignee_addr, shipping_order_code, carrier, carrier_note_code, shipping_point, expected_issue_date, issue_status, operator, company_sid, remark, material_category, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.issueNoteSid}, #{item.issueNoteCode}, #{item.documentDate}, #{item.vendorSid}, #{item.documentType}, #{item.plantSid}, #{item.businessType}, #{item.consignee}, #{item.consigneePhone}, #{item.consigneeAddr}, #{item.shippingOrderCode}, #{item.carrier}, #{item.carrierNoteCode}, #{item.shippingPoint}, #{item.expectedIssueDate}, #{item.issueStatus}, #{item.operator}, #{item.companySid}, #{item.remark}, #{item.materialCategory}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
